ðŸ“– Summary: Puck is an open-source visual editor for React.js, enabling developers to build custom drag-and-drop experiences using their own React components. It integrates seamlessly with React environments like Next.js and offers data ownership without vendor lock-in, licensed under MIT for both internal and commercial use.
